original_text: So Joab and the people who were with him drew near before the Syrians for battle, and they fled before him.
korean_text: 요압과 그 추종자가 싸우려고 아람 사람 앞에 나아가니 그들이 그 앞에서 도망하고

sentences.original_text: So Joab and the people were together.
They drew near before the Syrians for battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 전투를 위해 시리아인들 앞으로 다가갔습니다.
